data.name: AboutDetails
data.value: About the centre about the Fonder of the centre ( his biography). programs offered in our centre news about the centre. what's new about the centre

data.name: AboutUsP1
data.value: We are a center concerned with teaching Arabic reading to everyone with the ultimate objective of streamlining the learning experience and making it time-effective, in order to fulfill the aspiration of many Muslims, which is to read the Holy Quran.

data.name: AboutUsP2
data.value: The center is seeking the most effective approaches and the optimal Means for teaching Arabic reading and Empowerment in the reading of the Holy Quran.

data.name: AboutUsP3
data.value: It is the belief of the center that Arabic is a phonetic language with a close correspondence between its spoken and written components, a crucial factor in facilitating the learning of Arabic reading.

data.name: Article1
data.value: Additions and omissions in Arabic writing

data.name: Article2
data.value: Distinctions in written form between the Quran and standard Arabic

data.name: Article3
data.value: Special writing and reading rules of the Holy Qur’an

data.name: Article4
data.value: How to initiate the teaching and learning to read the Holy Qur'an

data.name: CentreMessageValue
data.value: facilitating learning the Arabic reading to read the nobel Quran

data.name: CentreOffer
data.value: The centre offers its programs for those who desire to learn Arabic reading and cannot read it, for beginners in learning it, and for those who aren't fluent in it.

data.name: CentreVisionValue
data.value: enable those who can't read the nobel Quran to read it

data.name: FifthProgramDescription
data.value:
Diagnosing and addressing Holy Quran reading deficiencies program for beginners
Through this program, the student's proficiency in Quranic vocabulary is evaluated, areas of weakness are pinpointed, and a customized program is designed to improve these skills.
Our program targets the root of reading difficulties rather than solely correcting word errors made by students.

data.name: FifthProgramHeading
data.value: Diagnosing and addressing Holy Quran reading deficiencies program for beginners

data.name: FirstProgramDescription
data.value: Teaching Arabic letters and reading trilateral words with Fat-ha -13 lessons

data.name: FirstProgramDescription2
data.value: Lectures are delivered in three different methods:

data.name: FirstProgramHeading
data.value: Teaching Basic Arabic Reading Principles program

data.name: FirstProgramlist2
data.value: In the virtual classroom (via learning platforms like Zoom). Where the student learns the letter sounds with the short vowel (Fat-ha), uses simple writing worksheets to practice writing the letters forms at the beginning, middle and end of the word in order to memorize the letter shapes in their different positions, and reads trilateral words with the Fat-ha which are consisted of letters previously learned

data.name: FirstProgramlist3
data.value: Via recorded video lessons on Taqraa Center for Holy Quran Literacy YouTube channel.

data.name: FounderCurrentJobValue
data.value: Manager of Iqraa Center for Arabic Language Learn

data.name: FounderExperienceValueLine1
data.value: Supervisor of teaching Arabic to students of the first three grades of the primary school

data.name: FounderName
data.value: Fahd bin Saleh bin Abdullah Al-Twaijri

data.name: FounderQualificationsValueLine1
data.value: Master in Linguistics from Umm Al-Qura University in Makkah Al-Mukarramah 2019.

data.name: FounderQualificationsValueLine2
data.value: BA in the Arabic language from Imam Muhammad bin Saud Islamic University, 2002

data.name: FounderWritingsValue
data.value: The book of "learn how to read the Noble Qur’an in thirty days"

data.name: FourthProgramDescription
data.value: Through this program, the student's proficiency in a set of vocabularies is evaluated, areas of weakness are pinpointed, and a customized program is designed to improve these skills.

data.name: FourthProgramHeading
data.value: Diagnosing and addressing reading deficiencies program

data.name: IQRAACentreP
data.value: A centre is interested in teaching Arabic for all, aiming for facilitating learning Arabic reading and shortening the time required for that, to fulfil a hope that many Muslims have, which is reading the Noble Quran.

data.name: IQRAACentreP2
data.value: The centre is looking for the best ways and the most appropriate means to teach Arabic and be able to read the Noble Quran.

data.name: IQRAACentreP3
data.value: Undoubtedly, the Arabic language is characterized by the proximity of its spoken sounds to its written letters and words, which facilitates and helps to learn Arabic reading thus learn to read the Noble Quran.

data.name: OurMessageP1
data.value: Evolve the best ways and means of promoting and facilitating the learning of Arabic reading.

data.name: OurVisionP1
data.value: Assisting individuals in achieving their aspirations of becoming proficient in reading Arabic

data.name: ReadingSkillsLearn
data.value: (Teaching Arabic reading skills ) ( 25 lessons ( Lessons from ITQAN book for mastering literal Arabic reading skills)

data.name: SecondBook
data.value: ITQAN (Mastering literal Arabic reading skills with some words pronunciation transliteration)

data.name: SecondProgramDescription
data.value: A program that helps students to correct their mistakes in reading the Noble Qur’an by addressing the causes of mistakes.Our goal in this program is to treat those mistakes from their roots. It is a program that can be offered to both native Arabic speakers and non-Arabic speakers

data.name: SecondProgramDescription2
data.value: Lectures are delivered in three different methods:

data.value: In the virtual classroom (via learning platforms like Zoom) - Chat room

data.name: SecondProgramlist3
data.value: In the virtual classroom (via learning platforms like Zoom) -one on one chat

data.name: SecondProgramlist4
data.value: Via recorded video lessons on ( ) platform.
